overview: This follow-up to the most brutal street fighting video ever packs an even bigger punch than the original. Caught on tape in the meanest streets across the country, these fights are cringe-worthy and totally real. The streets are a battleground where gangstas compete for respect, while crazy girls get totally freaky. Including bare-knuckle beatings, chick fights, and utter mayhem, this is the hardest-hitting, most raw, uncensored fare around, all set to a hot hip hop soundtrack.
title: Ghetto Fights 2
